stream_context.summary: Kaze focuses on scripting a new boss-intro cutscene for Return to Yoshi’s Island while casually brainstorming a separate YouTube "MrBeast-style" N64 hacking video. The stream is interrupted by an automatic copyright suspension triggered by background Evangelion music.

development_findings.summary: Kaze is scripting a cutscene in which a boss swallows Mario and then spits him out into the arena where the fight begins.
development_findings.quote: Right now what we're trying to do is we are making the cut scene where the boss eats Mario and spits you out at the scene where you fight them.

development_findings.summary: The cutscene flow: Mario exits the interior, speaks with Bowser in his office about lazy minions, returns to find the area empty and silent, and the boss makes a dramatic entrance (currently invisible due to a bug).
development_findings.quote: When you come out everyone's gone, it's quiet, you don't know what's happening and then this guy appears… oh god you can't even see him.

development_findings.summary: The Bowser-office segment will use a brand-new custom music track, implying upcoming work for the composer.
development_findings.quote: Moses office should have some funky music… yeah it will definitely have a custom song.

context_findings.summary: Kaze prides himself on punctuality and notes he will adjust next week’s stream schedule because he is attending a wedding.
context_findings.quote: I'm Kaze. Being on time is what I do… I have a wedding to attend next week so I might actually start stream half an hour early and I'm probably gonna have to cut it early too.

context_findings.summary: Kaze openly embraces click-bait tactics for future videos, stating he doesn’t mind bending the truth for entertainment.
context_findings.quote: It's literally just gonna be a lie though. I don't care though, it doesn't matter.

context_findings.summary: The stream is temporarily suspended by YouTube for a copyright violation caused by an Evangelion song, highlighting Kaze’s ongoing struggle with licensed music on stream.
context_findings.quote: Stream suspended for policy violations… because of the Evangelion song.

badub.summary: A new custom track is needed for the Bowser office scene, implying upcoming work for Badub.

zeina.summary: Zeina assists Kaze with replacement speakers and pitches the "in one day" angle for the MrBeast-style video.

key_stories.title: Building the Boss Intro Cutscene
key_stories.summary: Kaze outlines and tests a multi-stage cutscene where a boss swallows Mario, setting up the fight. The scene currently has visual bugs (the boss doesn’t appear).
key_stories.challenge: Create a seamless, narrative-driven transition from story dialogue to boss battle.
key_stories.process: Scripted interior stomach area with music; added Bowser dialogue; scripted environment state change to empty area; attempted to spawn boss actor.
key_stories.outcome: Basic flow works, but the boss model fails to render, so further debugging is needed.
key_stories.key_quote: This guy appears… oh god you can't even see him.

key_stories.title: Stream Halted by Copyright Bot
key_stories.summary: While working, YouTube automatically suspends the stream for playing an Evangelion track, forcing an unexpected pause.
key_stories.challenge: Avoid copyright strikes while streaming development.
key_stories.process: Stream audio included licensed music; YouTube flagged and halted the broadcast.
key_stories.outcome: Kaze must restart the stream and consider replacing licensed tracks with original music in future.
key_stories.key_quote: Stream suspended for policy violations… because of the Evangelion song.

key_stories.title: The MrBeast-Style N64 Hacking Video Idea
key_stories.summary: Kaze enthusiastically pitches a short-form, high-energy video where he "hacks every N64 game" with rapid-fire comedic cheats.
key_stories.challenge: Find a fresh, viral marketing angle for his hacking content.
key_stories.process: Outlined 25-game concept, planned six cheats so far, embraced click-bait title and pacing.
key_stories.outcome: Still in planning; Zeina suggests an "in one day" hook that Kaze likes.
key_stories.key_quote: I hacked every Nintendo 64 game and this is what happened.
